original_title: Tangled Web: Making Kiss of the Spider Woman
overview: Rare documents and details of the film's story. From its initial option to its critical reception and legacy. Director David Weisman, who also produced "Kiss of the Spider Woman", comes off as rightful creative force behind the production, as it was his true passion. Very detailed comments from all the participants, from the author of the book to the lawyer for the production company, the actors, director, writers, producer, and crew members.
tagline: A truly amazing story, unique in film history.
title: Tangled Web: Making Kiss of the Spider Woman
